lead_paragraph: A rebel coalition said that it was holding soldiers captured in fighting a day earlier, as growing violence in the north threatened to derail peace efforts brokered by the United Nations.

headline.print_headline: Mali: Rebels Say They Have Captured 19 Soldiers
headline.main: Mali: Rebels Say They Have Captured 19 Soldiers

snippet: A rebel coalition said that it was holding soldiers captured in fighting a day earlier, as growing violence in the north threatened to derail peace efforts brokered by the United Nations.
